CustomField.description:
Used by the Project Management to indicate which terms are adopted for official use on the project, over their related counterparts.
Be aware that creating a Field Dependency on this field negates the ability to edit in a List View. This may limit Term management.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used by the Project Management to indicate which terms are adopted for official use on the project, over their related counterparts.
CustomField.label: Project Usage Status
